titles.title: Fling Out the Banner! Let It Float

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Fling out the banner! let it float Skyward and seaward, high and wide; The sun that lights its shining folds, The cross on which the Savior died.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Fling out the banner, heathen lands Shall see from far the glorious sight, And nations, crowding to be born, Baptize their spirits in its light.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Fling out the banner, sin-sick souls That sink and perish in the strife. Shall touch in faith its radiant hem, And spring immortal into life.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Fling out the banner, let it float Skyward and seaward, high and wide, Our glory only in the cross; Our only hope, the Crucified!
